questions: Jack wants to buy two pairs of socks, one bag and two hats. How much are they?
article:
Wen Feng Store Sale
Goods     Colors     Price(each)
Socks      Black, white, green $3
Sweater   Black      $15
Hat  Blue, white     $4
T-shirt     Red, green      $14
Shoes      Black and white     $25
Bag  Blue $5
